title: The Most Super Prices For Mario Party Jamboree, Space Marine 2, Persona GOTYs, and More!
description: The week continues with the finest gaming discounts, price-slices, and bargains available! Get 'em before they go.
author: Adam Mathew
byline: The Best Gaming Deals In Australia
excerpt: The week continues with the finest gaming discounts, price-slices, and bargains available! Get 'em before they go.
text: Welcome, my friends, to the party. A super Mario party (in the form of a 9/10 Switch jamboree), plus the usual bargains bash I throw. Some deals that pique my personal interest include Mass Effect Legendary, It Takes Two, and the Metro Saga Bundle, all for around 14 bucks. Insane value for money. Get amongst 'em if you somehow haven't already. In retro news, I'm celebrating the 32nd birthday of Sonic the Hedgehog 2, a Master System must-own. Much to Sega's credit, this wasn't some sort of half-arsed, shoehorned-down port of its Mega big brother. Rather, we got a brand spanking 8-bitventure with new Zones, boss battles, and, for some reason, hang gliding levels? The only blemish I remember: somebody thought speed-nerfing water levels ought to come over from the 16-bit blueprint, annnd they sucked harder than a Robotnik-grade Vacuum Bot. html:
Welcome, my friends, to the party. A super Mario party (in the form of a 9/10 Switch jamboree), plus the usual bargains bash I throw. Some deals that pique my personal interest include Mass Effect Legendary, It Takes Two, and the Metro Saga Bundle, all for around 14 bucks. Insane value for money. Get amongst 'em if you somehow haven't already.

In retro news, I'm celebrating the 32nd birthday of Sonic the Hedgehog 2, a Master System must-own. Much to Sega's credit, this wasn't some sort of half-arsed, shoehorned-down port of its Mega big brother. Rather, we got a brand spanking 8-bitventure with new Zones, boss battles, and, for some reason, hang gliding levels? The only blemish I remember: somebody thought speed-nerfing water levels ought to come over from the 16-bit blueprint, annnd they sucked harder than a Robotnik-grade Vacuum Bot.

This Day in Gaming ðŸŽ‚

Aussie birthdays for notable games and hardware

- Sonic the Hedgehog 2 (MS) 1992. eBay

- The Evil Within (PS3/4,X360/O) 2014. Get

Happy Bday Sonic 2 (MS)

Nice Savings for Nintendo Switch

Super Mario Party Jamboree

An amazing follow-up to Mario Party Superstars and easily one of the best games in the series. Not only does it faithfully return to the classic formula established in the Nintendo 64 entries, it confidently improves upon it. 9/10, amazing.
